premise_source_doc_sentence: Rodman Edward `` Rod '' Serling  (  December 25 , 1924 -- June 28 , 1975  )  was an American screenwriter , playwright , television producer , and narrator known for his live television dramas of the 1950s and his science-fiction anthology TV series , The Twilight Zone .

claim: Rod Serling clashed with people over war.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Serling was active in politics , both on and off the screen , and helped form television industry standards .

claim: Rod Serling clashed with people over war.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He was known as the `` angry young man '' of Hollywood , clashing with television executives and sponsors over a wide range of issues including censorship , racism , and war .
